com.hc.blockchain.service.wallet

接口 IImportWalletService


  • public interface IImportWalletService
    接口IImportWalletService导入钱包服务层接口

    主要包括

    1. 通过助记词导入钱包
    2. 通过私钥导入钱包
    3. 通过keystore文件导入钱包
    从以下版本开始:
    2018/11/23 9:23
    另请参阅:
    ImportWalletServiceImpl, BaseDTO

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      com.hc.blockchain.dto.BaseDTO importBIP44WalletByMnemonic(java.lang.String newPassword, java.lang.String mnemonic, java.lang.String path)
      通过助记词导入钱包,需要提示用户删除旧的keystore文件 // 助记词 String mnemonic = "guide sure jungle vicious brass neglect practice pistol reduce girl witness moon"; // 新密码 String newPassword = "0123456789"; String path = PathEnum.ETH.getName(); BaseDTO dto = service.importBIP44WalletByMnemonic(newPassword, mnemonic, path);
      com.hc.blockchain.dto.BaseDTO importWalletByKeystore(java.lang.String oldPassword, java.lang.String keystore)
      通过keystore文件导入钱包 String keystore = "{\"address\":\"49ae329d74a9ea653762fcd89e860b70fb6d7def\",\"id\":\"85f9dc4a-7d41-4eab-b3d5-809b1b8939d0\",\"version\":3,\"crypto\":{\"cipher\":\"aes-128-ctr\",\"ciphertext\":\"713a45f8dbe5b406f4bb5acc69d2f01e95bf4046fea7b1616a763d4bcc2a0653\",\"cipherparams\":{\"iv\":\"f49caa4251c495df72c72b7d443e8aa6\"},\"kdf\":\"scrypt\",\"kdfparams\":{\"dklen\":32,\"n\":4096,\"p\":6,\"r\":8,\"salt\":\"b9f763e645c7d2fbafd8435f7c7769b0f2f158951eeea0006e64957fdd5f63ed\"},\"mac\":\"b6c2c5b61602bd0d508fefe65409247ff815ccdacf7b5ad5dedae7dcc0a31df3\"}}"; String oldPassword = "123456789"; BaseDTO dto = service.importWalletByKeystore(oldPassword, keystore);
      com.hc.blockchain.dto.BaseDTO importWalletByMnemonic(java.lang.String newPassword, java.lang.String mnemonic)
      已过时。 
      use importBIP44WalletByMnemonic instead
      com.hc.blockchain.dto.BaseDTO importWalletByPrivateKey(java.lang.String newPassword, java.lang.String privateKey)
      通过私钥导入钱包 String privateKey = "c573d279c879b982c9a8ce1300d820bc00d11fe89fd600e0b31ad03a791914bb"; String newPassword = "123456789"; BaseDTO dto = service.importWalletByPrivateKey(newPassword, privateKey);

    • 方法详细资料

      • importWalletByMnemonic

        com.hc.blockchain.dto.BaseDTO importWalletByMnemonic(java.lang.String newPassword,
                                                     java.lang.String mnemonic)
        已过时。 use importBIP44WalletByMnemonic instead

        通过助记词导入钱包,需要提示用户删除旧的keystore文件

         // 助记词
 String mnemonic = "guide sure jungle vicious brass neglect practice pistol reduce girl witness moon";
 // 新密码
 String newPassword = "0123456789";
 BaseDTO dto = service.importWalletByMnemonic(newPassword, mnemonic);
        参数:
        newPassword - 新密码
        mnemonic - 助记词字符串,以空格分割
        返回:
        BaseDTO
        另请参阅:
        BaseDTO

      • importBIP44WalletByMnemonic

        com.hc.blockchain.dto.BaseDTO importBIP44WalletByMnemonic(java.lang.String newPassword,
                                                          java.lang.String mnemonic,
                                                          java.lang.String path)

        通过助记词导入钱包,需要提示用户删除旧的keystore文件

         // 助记词
 String mnemonic = "guide sure jungle vicious brass neglect practice pistol reduce girl witness moon";
 // 新密码
 String newPassword = "0123456789";
 String path = PathEnum.ETH.getName();
 BaseDTO dto = service.importBIP44WalletByMnemonic(newPassword, mnemonic, path);
        参数:
        newPassword - 新密码
        mnemonic - 助记词字符串,以空格分割
        path - 父路径,分层确定性钱包里面父路径 BIP32 Derivation Path
        返回:
        BaseDTO
        另请参阅:
        BaseDTO

      • importWalletByPrivateKey

        com.hc.blockchain.dto.BaseDTO importWalletByPrivateKey(java.lang.String newPassword,
                                                       java.lang.String privateKey)

        通过私钥导入钱包

         String privateKey = "c573d279c879b982c9a8ce1300d820bc00d11fe89fd600e0b31ad03a791914bb";
 String newPassword = "123456789";
 BaseDTO dto = service.importWalletByPrivateKey(newPassword, privateKey);
        参数:
        newPassword - 新密码
        privateKey - 明文私钥
        返回:
        BaseDTO
        另请参阅:
        BaseDTO

      • importWalletByKeystore

        com.hc.blockchain.dto.BaseDTO importWalletByKeystore(java.lang.String oldPassword,
                                                     java.lang.String keystore)

        通过keystore文件导入钱包

         String keystore = "{\"address\":\"49ae329d74a9ea653762fcd89e860b70fb6d7def\",\"id\":\"85f9dc4a-7d41-4eab-b3d5-809b1b8939d0\",\"version\":3,\"crypto\":{\"cipher\":\"aes-128-ctr\",\"ciphertext\":\"713a45f8dbe5b406f4bb5acc69d2f01e95bf4046fea7b1616a763d4bcc2a0653\",\"cipherparams\":{\"iv\":\"f49caa4251c495df72c72b7d443e8aa6\"},\"kdf\":\"scrypt\",\"kdfparams\":{\"dklen\":32,\"n\":4096,\"p\":6,\"r\":8,\"salt\":\"b9f763e645c7d2fbafd8435f7c7769b0f2f158951eeea0006e64957fdd5f63ed\"},\"mac\":\"b6c2c5b61602bd0d508fefe65409247ff815ccdacf7b5ad5dedae7dcc0a31df3\"}}";
 String oldPassword = "123456789";
 BaseDTO dto = service.importWalletByKeystore(oldPassword, keystore);
        参数:
        oldPassword - 原始密码 备份keystore的时候使用的密码
        keystore - keystore文件内容
        返回:
        BaseDTO
        另请参阅:
        BaseDTO
